QuestData.Title: Just Peachicky
QuestData.Description: That mean old Sher'khaan! He's always been a bully to these poor peachicks, but this is crossing the line!$b$bI was trying to move this poor clutch out of the way of the demons when he attacked! Now the peachicks are spread out all over and they're scared!$b$bPlease help me bring them all back!
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue 7 Frightened Peachicks and return them to Caleb.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you find my missing peachick friends?!
QuestData.RewardText: Oh thank you! Now these little peachicks can be moved to safety.
